mapper.select: select a.ID, a.IMAGE_NAME, '/' || a.IMAGE_PATH AS IMAGE_PATH, a.FILE_TYPE, a.SESSION_YEAR, a.SESSION_MONTH, a.SESSION_PIOVINCE, a.SESSION_REGION, a.CREATE_DATE, b.PSN_NAME AS CREATE_ID, a.IS_LIKE, CASE WHEN a.IS_LIKE = 0 THEN '否' ELSE '已收藏' END AS isLikeName from OPEN_IMAGE_ALBUM a LEFT JOIN SYS_PERSON b ON a.CREATE_ID = b.ID where 1=1 and a.del_flag = '0' and a.id = #{getImageAlbumVo.ids}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPEN_IMAGE_ALBUM( ID, IMAGE_NAME, IMAGE_PATH, SESSION_YEAR, SESSION_MONTH, SESSION_PIOVINCE, SESSION_REGION, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_ID, FILE_TYPE )VALUES( #{getImageAlbumVo.ids}, #{getImageAlbumVo.imageName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{getImageAlbumVo.imagePath}, #{getImageAlbumVo.sessionYear}, #{getImageAlbumVo.sessionMonth}, #{getImageAlbumVo.sessionPiovince}, #{getImageAlbumVo.sessionRegion}, #{getImageAlbumVo.createDate}, #{getImageAlbumVo.createId}, #{getImageAlbumVo.fileType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE OPEN_IMAGE_ALBUM SET IMAGE_NAME = #{getImageAlbumVo.imageName}, SESSION_YEAR = #{getImageAlbumVo.sessionYear}, SESSION_MONTH = #{getImageAlbumVo.sessionMonth}, SESSION_PIOVINCE = #{getImageAlbumVo.sessionPiovince}, SESSION_REGION = #{getImageAlbumVo.sessionRegion} WHERE ID = #{getImageAlbumVo.ids}
UPDATE OPEN_IMAGE_ALBUM SET IS_LIKE = #{isLike} WHERE ID = #{ids}
UPDATE OPEN_IMAGE_ALBUM SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{ids}
